game.name: Train Simulator: Santa Fe Classic Pack 01
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Santa Fe: In the long history of American railroading, perhaps no single railroad was more iconic and renowned, and no livery was more widely familiar and cherished than the red-and-silver “Warbonnet” scheme worn by AT&SF’s flashy diesels.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Santa Fe: In the long history of American railroading, perhaps no single railroad was more iconic and renowned, and no livery was more widely familiar and cherished than the red-and-silver “Warbonnet” scheme worn by AT&SF’s flashy diesels.
